newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Gazprom says has supported share price in regions.
newsitem.headline: Gazprom says has supported share price in regions.

text.p: Russian gas group Gazprom has supported its price on local markets in order to close a gap between Moscow and regional prices, the head of securities on the Gazprom board said on Thursday.

"Because of our activity, if earlier the price differential between Moscow and the regions was up to two or three times, now it is down to about 15 percent," Alexander Semenyaka told a news conference.
"That is, you will not buy cheap shares in the regions."
He declined to say how much of its own shares Gazprom bought but said it did not keep a balance on its books.
